newsitem.title: USA: Expert Software backs Q2 $0.01 EPS view.
newsitem.headline: Expert Software backs Q2 $0.01 EPS view.

text.p: Expert Software Inc chief executive officer Ken Currier said Tuesday he is comfortable with an analyst's predictions of earnings per share of $0.01 for the second quarter and $0.21 for the year.
"We continue to be comfortable with these predictions," Currier said at a Piper Jaffray investment conference here.
Expert Software had earnings of $0.05 a share for the first quarter of 1997, and a loss of $1.33 per share for all of 1996.
Currier said in an interview that his company expects a sharp upswing in demand for its software in September.
At that time Expert will launch a series of software programs based on fast food restaurant chain McDonald's characters including Ronald McDonald.
"It will accelerate our growth," Currier said. "This will help illustrate to others what we can do."
